subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Michael Turner ran for 152 yards, John Abraham had three sacks and the visiting Falcons finished off a sloppy performance with Jason Elam’s 34-yard field goal in overtime Sunday.
snippet: Michael Turner ran for 152 yards, John Abraham had three sacks and the visiting Falcons finished off a sloppy performance with Jason Elam’s 34-yard field goal in overtime Sunday.
